essential_properties.name: domain
essential_properties.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, "stripe.com".

essential_properties.name: domain
essential_properties.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, "stripe.com".

essential_properties.name: firstname
essential_properties.description: The person's first name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase.

essential_properties.name: lastname
essential_properties.description: The person's last name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase.

essential_properties.name: email
essential_properties.description: The email address you want to verify

common_operations.name: Domain Search
common_operations.description: Get every email address found on the internet using a given domain name, with sources

common_operations.name: Email Finder
common_operations.description: Generate or retrieve the most likely email address from a domain name, a first name and a last name

common_operations.name: Email Verifier
common_operations.description: Verify the deliverability of an email address
